text.0: Though edwendan (MS.) might possibly be considered a verb (edwendende = 'rediens' occurs Regius Psalter 77.39), it is far more likely that the noun edwenden was intended, see 1774, 2188 (predic. cwōm). The genitive phrase bealuwa bisigu belongs both with ednwenden and bōt (see 909, 933 f.).
